channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Edifier Sets Out Its Audio Stall With Plenty Of Speakers On Show At CES2026
item.description: Audio brand Edifier will be showing off its new M90 active speakers at CES2026 alongside the popular MR Series of studio monitors and the popular QR65...

item.title: Meet an Oregon cafe where American Sign Language is the default way to order
item.description: The cafe — owned by CymaSpace, a nonprofit that makes art accessible to the Deaf community — also hosts weekly ASL meetups and game nights.

item.title: ‘The Pitt’ Season 2’s Episode Release Schedule Is A Dream
item.description: The Pitt season 2 release date is imminent, and its episode airing schedule from here is like nothing else on TV right now. It's amazing.

item.title: Texas, Florida again top U-Haul 'Growth Index'
item.description: Texas, Florida and other southern states are the places in the U.S. where people moved to the most in 2025, according to U-Haul's latest "Growth Index...

item.title: Trump Mobile has been accepting $100 deposits for a golden phone but the prototype is nowhere to be seen as CES kicks off
item.description: Trump Mobile initially hailed T1 as a device that would be “proudly designed and built in the United States for customers who expect the best."

item.title: Trump’s Ukraine peace plan endangered by his launch of a new war in the western hemisphere, saber rattling over Greeland
item.description: Leaders of Ukraine’s allies gathered Tuesday in Paris for key talks that could help determine the country’s security after any potential peace deal.

item.title: Maduro's removal could reverse decades of economic struggles for Venezuelans
item.description: The arrest of Nicolás Maduro in a U.S. raid could bring relief to average Venezuelans after decades of economic mismanagement led to rampant inflation...

item.title: New Report Says Dave Filoni Is About To Run All Of ‘Star Wars’
item.description: Dave Filoni may be tapped to lead Star Wars, according to a new report, when Kathleen Kennedy leaves. Is that good or bad news?

item.title: Air traffic still runs on floppy discs in places, so the FAA just picked 2 companies for a $26 billion radar overhaul
item.description: The FAA has been spending most of its $3 billion equipment budget just maintaining the fragile old system.

item.title: A Psychologist Shares A Fun Quiz To Measure Your 2026 ‘Aura’ — Backed By Personality Science
item.description: What type of energy are you bringing into the new year? Take a science-inspired assessment to find out.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Wednesday, January 7
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Pizza plummeted on the list of Americans’ favorite take-out options as they opt for more nutrient-dense slop bowls from Uber Eats
item.description: Even when customers choose pizza, they tend to get smaller pies and fewer toppings, said Papa John’s executives.

item.title: Economic calendar: Two Fed speakers and a services-sector update on agenda

As AMD chases Nvidia, here’s how it’s positioning itself for the future of AI

Maduro’s capture puts Cuba’s Venezuelan oil-dependent economy at risk
item.description: The U.S. military captures Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, threatening Cuba's economy as the nation loses a key provider of oil supplies for communi...

item.title: Oil experts predict slight rise in gas prices as global tensions mount
item.description: Oil and gasoline prices could rise slightly due to Venezuelan export losses and geopolitical uncertainty, though pump prices remain at COVID-19 lows.

item.title: Venezuela's billions in distressed debt: Who is in line to collect?
item.description: Venezuela defaulted in 2017 on government and PDVSA bonds, with accumulated interest swelling total liabilities far beyond original amounts.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
